TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RegularExpressionValidator extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BaseValidator

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供控制項功能，以驗證另一個控制項的值是否符合提供的規則運算式。

span.span: Provides control capability to validate that another control's value matches a provided regular expression.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的行為即會相同 asp.net控制項。This class behaves identically to the ASP.NET control. 根據預設，表單上的控制項引發時要執行驗證表單提交給伺服器表單上的驗證程式控制項。By default, controls on a form raise validator controls on the form to perform validation when the form is submitted to the server. 若要停用自動驗證，請設定屬性至`false`。To disable automatic validation, set the property on the to `false`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在加入規則運算式的屬性，例如和屬性，以程式設計方式在頁面載入過程中。The following example shows how you can add regular expression properties, such as the and properties, programmatically during a page load. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileRegExprValidatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileRegExprValidatorSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileRegExprValidatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileRegExprValidatorSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ValidationExpression { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定指定做為驗證準則的規則運算式。

span.span: Gets or sets the regular expression assigned to be the validation criteria.
The default value is an empty string ("").

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

value.span: 指定做為驗證準則的規則運算式。

span.span: The regular expression assigned to be the validation criteria.

value.span: 不會對空字串執行驗證。

span.span: The does not perform validation on an empty string.

value.span: 如果要測試空字串，請同時使用 和 控制項。

span.span: To test for an empty string, use the and controls together.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示一些範例驗證運算式：The following table shows some sample validation expressions: |驗證的類型Type of Validation|驗證運算式Validation Expression| |------------------------|---------------------------| |EmailEmail|\w+([-+.]\w+)*@\w+([-.]\w+)\*\\.\w+([-.]\w+)\w+([-+.]\w+)*@\w+([-.]\w+)\*\\.\w+([-.]\w+)| |電話號碼Phone number|((\\(\d{3}\\) ?)|(\d{3}-))?\d{3}-\d{4}((\\(\d{3}\\) ?)|(\d{3}-))?\d{3}-\d{4}| |URLURL|http://([\w-]+\\.)+[\w-]+(/[\w-./?%&=]\*)?http://([\w-]+\\.)+[\w-]+(/[\w-./?%&=]\*)?|

exception.span: 指定的規則運算式錯誤。

span.span: The regular expression assigned was malformed.
